name: helix-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an omanyte.
short_effect: Can be revived into an Omanyte.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It might be a piece of a seashell.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It might be a piece of a seashell.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived in the sea. It might be a piece of a seashell.
